310001641.Title: Unique Retro 21.6 in. 7 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Summer Mint Green, ENERGY STAR
310001641.Description: Unique's 7 cu. ft. retro bottom mount refrigerator transports you back to the 50s with its iconic retro design and chrome finished accents. Pair up with a Unique Summer Mint Green Retro range for a stunning Matched Pair collection. This refrigerator is ENERGY STAR Certified for energy efficiency all year-round, designed for optimal energy savings and easy, dependable use. Storing your fresh and frozen foods is easy with its convenient fridge on top and freezer on the bottom design. Convenient storage options and simple effortless controls all packed into a stylish retro design make this the perfect stand out unit for your home, cottage, man cave/bar.

300198835.Title: Summit Appliance 24 in. 11.35 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, Counter Depth, Silver
300198835.Description: Summit's thin-line series of ENERGY STAR certified bottom freezer refrigerators conserves energy and space but adds quality and function with innovative features, convenient sizes, and energy efficient operation. Sized under 24 in. wide, the FFBF246SSLHD is perfect for space-challenged kitchens with full storage needs. The platinum cabinet and stainless steel doors bring luxurious style to the kitchen, with pro style handles to complete the look. This unit comes with a left-hand door swing. Full frost-free operation eliminates the need to manually defrost the interior, saving on user maintenance while maintaining the perfect conditions for storing groceries. Inside, the FFBF246SSLHD comes fully featured for maximum storage convenience. The refrigerator section includes adjustable shelves made from safety glass for durability and easy cleaning. Adjustable door racks offer additional storage options, while a large crisper drawer is ideal for keeping produce fresh. This unit includes a removable scalloped steel shelf to store wine and other bottles. An innovative touch control system lets you manage the refrigerator and freezer temperature with an intuitive digital thermostat. LED lighting offers an efficient and attractive view inside. The lower freezer compartment features three slide-out drawers with plastic fronts to help protect stored items when the door is opened.

205850432.Title: KitchenAid 20.9 cu. ft. Built-In Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, Platinum Interior, Silver
205850432.Description: This built-in bottom-mount refrigerator from KitchenAid is as beautiful inside as it is outside. The Preserva Food Care System features three technologies that work in concert to assure crisp produce and deliciously flavorful foods while helping to eliminate refrigerator odors. The exclusive Platinum Interior Design features glossy silver walls that harmonize with the metallic accents on shelves, crisper and baskets of this right-swing door refrigerator. Color: Stainless Steel.

308873044.Title: Chambers 7 cu. ft. Retro Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Butter Cream
308873044.Description: This compact Energy Star certified Retro style refrigerator in Butter Cream brings space and energy efficiency to any location. With a bottom freezer configuration, it brings the fresh food area, the space you use the most, off the floor and easily accessible. Only 22 in. wide by 57 in. high it will fit in any small space and under most overhead cabinets. With a bright LED light and loads of adjustability, you can easily see what's inside and find that perfect spot where to your groceries and drinks will go - no problem. Available in four stunning, modern colors, this fridge will make an eye-catching statement in any room - just picture this in your kitchen, rec room, office, lunchroom, man/she cave, bar, studio, cabin or cottage.

306942608.Title: Summit Appliance 24 in. W 12.5 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, Counter Depth, Stainless steel look
306942608.Description: SUMMIT's collection of ENERGY STAR qualified frost-free refrigerator-freezers provides an attractive and user-friendly solution to small kitchen spaces. The counter depth FFBF192SSLHD is a bottom freezer refrigerator sized with a unique 24 in. width that offers a generous 12.5 cu. ft. storage capacity. It comes with a textured platinum cabinet and sealed back design. The doors feature the look of stainless steel in a fingerprint-resistant alternative finish. NOTE: this unit ships with a left-hand door swing. For a right-hand version, see the FFBF192SS. The FFBF192SSLHD includes an external digital control panel in a sleek mirror finish, allowing you to manage the interior without exposing stored contents to room temperature. This also includes an open-door alarm that will sound if either door is left open for over two minutes. Inside, the FFBF192SSLHD utilizes frost-free operation for minimum user maintenance in both compartments. The refrigerator section includes spill-proof glass shelves and removable door racks. This unit comes with a clear crisper for produce storage, as well as a slide-out storage drawer designed to keep meats and certain other items at a slightly colder temperature. The lower freezer section features three clear slide-out drawers for added efficiency and more organized storage. We include a removable ice cube box for added convenience. Color: Stainless steel look.

313875841.Title: Conserv 11.5 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Real Stainless with Wine Rack, Stainless less Steel
313875841.Description: This Bottom mounted Tall Slim Refrigerator MDRF376-1150 features a refrigerator capacity of 7.9 cubic feet and 3.6 cubic feet of freezer space. This free-standing real stainless refrigerator, measuring 74.1 x 23.4 x 25.1 inches (HxWxD), packs a powerful punch in features like a reversible door and closed back panel, which lets you place the unit flush against a wall to save space. The convenient frost-free feature takes away the worry of having to manually defrost the freezer. Modern LED lights offer a stylish look, while the spacious interior, with glass shelves, drawers, crisper and wine rack provides ample space for food and beverage storage. This space saving small footprint refrigerator is a must have for your contemporary kitchen. Color: Stainless less Steel.

It has a convenient freezer drawer that places frozen items in close reach, making it easy to organize and find exactly what you need. You'll be able to keep food at the right temperature without wasting energy thanks to the Accu-Chill temperature management system. 312899428.Title: Summit Appliance 27 in. 14.8 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, Counter Depth, Silver
312899428.Description: The FFBF279SSLHD is conveniently sized at 27 5/8 inches wide and just under 27 inches deep, with a generous 14.8 cu.ft. capacity to meet a family's storage needs in minimum floor space. Stainless steel doors feature an attractive horizontal grain, with a textured platinum cabinet for a great look in any kitchen. This unit has side pocket handles and interior controls for a clean look. The sealed back offers added space savings and easier cleanup. This model has a left hand door swing. Inside, the FFBF279SSLHD utilizes frost-free operation for low maintenance use. The digital controls ensure easy temperature management. It also includes a holiday setting, which allows the refrigerator to run at warmer temperatures to help save energy when not in use during vacation or other extended periods of inactivity. The refrigerator section features automatic LED lighting for an attractive, energy efficient view. Adjustable glass shelves and a full-width crisper drawer ensure easy storage. The door includes three full shelves and two adjustable half racks to best accommodate bottles and other condiments. The large freezer section features two slide-out drawers in clear plastic, helping to protect your stored items from warmer temperature when the door is opened. This model is equipped with a twistable manual ice tray that lets you make miniature cubes and drop them into a removable small bucket.

Sized under 24 in. wide, the FFBF247SSIM is perfect for space-challenged kitchens with full storage needs. 302175597.Title: Summit Appliance 24 in. W 12.8 cu. ft. Built-In Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, Counter Depth, Platinum/ Stainless Steel
302175597.Description: The FFBF181ESBI is a built-in bottom freezer refrigerator with a unique 24 in. W x 25-1/4 in. D footprint and generous 12.8 cu. ft. capacity. It comes in a platinum cabinet finish with stainless steel doors and designer handles. The exterior digital control panel lets you manage the refrigerator and freezer temperature without opening the door. The control panel includes an audible and visual high temperature and open door alarm to help protect stored contents. Inside, the FFBF181ESBI features a fully frost-free freezer compartment and an automatic defrost refrigerator section. The refrigerator section includes adjustable spill-proof glass shelves, as well as a scalloped shelf ideal for storing wine and other bottled beverages. The door features adjustable racks to accommodate a variety of sizes. This unit includes a ZeroZone deli drawer ideal for storing meats and cheeses at slightly colder temperatures than the rest of the refrigerator compartment. The large crisper drawer features humidity control for optimum storage of fruits and vegetables. This unit is equipped with adaptive intelligent technology that utilizes innovative sensors to automatically adjust to your habits. The lower frost-free freezer compartment is equipped with three slide-out drawers with plastic fronts to better protect stored items from ambient air when the door is opened. A freezer boost function on the control panel helps the unit to reach its coldest temperature faster. Color: Platinum/ Stainless Steel.

312423697.Title: Unique Retro 21.6 in. 9 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Powder Blue, ENERGY STAR
312423697.Description: Unique's 9 cu. ft. retro bottom mount refrigerator transports you back to the 50s with its iconic retro design and chrome finished accents. This refrigerator is ENERGY STAR Certified for energy efficiency all year-round, designed for optimal energy savings and easy, dependable use. Storing your fresh and frozen foods is easy with its convenient fridge on top and freezer on the bottom design. Convenient storage options and simple effortless controls all packed into a stylish retro design make this the perfect stand out unit for your home, cottage, man cave/bar. Color: Powder Blue.

309480550.Title: LG Electronics 14.7 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator with Door Cooling, Multi-Air Flow and Reversible Door in Platinum Silver, Platinum Silver (PCM)
309480550.Description: A generous 15 cu. ft. of space gives you ample room for your needs. With contoured doors, hidden hinges, and a host of great interior features like LED lighting give your refrigerator a look as sophisticated as it is functional. Forget stooping to reach your favorites with LG's bottom freezer refrigerator. All your fresh foods are front and center. Even getting to the ice cream is no longer a rocky road, thanks to the well-designed swing door freezer with roll-out drawers. Color: Platinum Silver (PCM).

314164509.Title: iio 11 cu. ft. Retro Frost Free Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Black, Blak
314164509.Description: It’s cool, it’s stylish, it’s fun. This retro-modern slim refrigerator, has a surprising amount of adjustable space, left or right-hand door swing, and square sides for side-by-side installation. With bright LED illumination, 3 safety glass shelves, a convenient frost-free top fresh food area and bottom freezer, the iio RM1 comes in gorgeous wine red, black, cream or white to fit any decor. Color: Blak.

312511532.Title: Unique Retro 21.6 in. 7 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Powder Blue, ENERGY STAR
312511532.Description: Unique's 7 cu. ft. retro bottom mount refrigerator transports you back to the 50s with its iconic retro design and chrome finished accents. This refrigerator is ENERGY STAR Certified for energy efficiency all year-round, designed for optimal energy savings and easy, dependable use. Storing your fresh and frozen foods is easy with its convenient fridge on top and freezer on the bottom design. Convenient storage options and simple effortless controls all packed into a stylish retro design make this the perfect stand out unit for your home, cottage, man cave/bar. Color: Powder Blue.

316086907.Title: Samsung BESPOKE 12.0 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator with Customizable Colors and Flexible Design in White Glass
316086907.Description: BESPOKE Bottom Freezer refrigerator can be used alone or combined with another BESPOKE Bottom Freezer refrigerator or Flex Column to design the perfect refrigerator for your home. Plus, choose from three unique colors. A slim, modern look. Color: White Glass.

308873043.Title: Chambers 7 cu. ft. Retro Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Frost White
308873043.Description: This compact Energy Star certified Retro style refrigerator in Frost White brings space and energy efficiency to any location. With a bottom freezer configuration, it brings the fresh food area, the space you use the most, off the floor and easily accessible. Only 22 in. wide by 57 in. high it will fit in any small space and under most overhead cabinets. With a bright LED light and loads of adjustability, you can easily see what's inside and find that perfect spot where to your groceries and drinks will go - no problem. Available in four stunning, modern colors, this fridge will make an eye-catching statement in any room - just picture this in your kitchen, rec room, office, lunchroom, man/she cave, bar, studio, cabin or cottage.

314109250.Title: Chambers 7 cu. ft. Retro Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Midnight Black
314109250.Description: This compact Energy Star certified Retro style refrigerator in Midnight Black brings space and energy efficiency to any location. With a bottom freezer configuration, it brings the fresh food area, the space you use the most, off the floor and easily accessible. Only 22 in. wide by 57 in. high it will fit in any small space and under most overhead cabinets. With a bright LED light and loads of adjustability, you can easily see what's inside and find that perfect spot where to your groceries and drinks will go - no problem. Available in four stunning, modern colors, this fridge will make an eye-catching statement in any room - just picture this in your kitchen, rec room, office, lunchroom, man/she cave, bar, studio, cabin or cottage.

205140688.Title: Whirlpool 18.7 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Monochromatic Stainless Steel
205140688.Description: Storing all of your favorite fresh and frozen foods is easy with this 18.7 cu. ft. capacity bottom-freezer refrigerator featuring a convenient freezer drawer that places frozen items in close reach, making it easy to organize and find exactly what you need. You'll be able to keep food at the right temperature without wasting energy thanks to the Accu-Chill temperature management system, which uses built-in sensors to measure internal temperature and activates the compressor only when necessary. And food will be easy to see thanks to energy-efficient LED lights, which cast a bright, natural looking light. And you can enjoy having a refrigerator with all of these great features even more knowing it has been designed, engineered and assembled in the U.S.A. Color: Monochromatic Stainless Steel.

206855014.Title: 21 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, ENERGY STAR, Silver
206855014.Description: Your GE 20.9 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel has hidden hinges that lets you step up to rounded doors and the clean look of concealed hinges. GE appliances provide up-to-date technology and exceptional quality to simplify the way you live. With a timeless appearance, this family of appliances is ideal for your family. And, coming from one of the most trusted names in America, you know that this entire selection of appliances is as advanced as it is practical.

304807372.Title: Bosch 500 Series 24 in. 11 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, Counter Depth, Silver
304807372.Description: Healthy living starts with consuming fresh ingredients, and our Bosch refrigerators are designed to keep foods at their optimal freshness, maintaining their intended nutrients and flavor. Bosch refrigerators feature VitaFresh to preserve your favorite foods, by keeping fruits and vegetables fresher, longer. Bosch refrigerators blend peacefully into any kitchen space and install as flush, counter or standard depths. Thoughtful features like premium tempered glass, hidden hinges and crisp LED lighting reveal a tangible level quality enjoyed with everyday use. Color: Stainless Steel.

312511506.Title: Unique Retro 21.6 in. 7 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Ocean Mist Turquoise, ENERGY STAR
312511506.Description: Unique's 7 cu. ft. retro bottom mount refrigerator transports you back to the 50s with its iconic retro design and chrome finished accents. Pair up with a Unique Ocean Mist Turquoise Retro range for a stunning Matched Pair collection. This refrigerator is ENERGY STAR Certified for energy efficiency all year-round, designed for optimal energy savings and easy, dependable use. Storing your fresh and frozen foods is easy with its convenient fridge on top and freezer on the bottom design. Convenient storage options and simple effortless controls all packed into a stylish retro design make this the perfect stand out unit for your home, cottage, man cave/bar.

313925684.Title: Haier 27 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, Fingerprint Resistant Stainless Steel
313925684.Description: Haier appliances are born for the city and designed to keep pace with a new way of living. Our appliances combine world-class design, innovative technology and a touch of city hustle, so you can live your best life 24/7. By making chores easier and life more livable, we bring the spirit of the city into your home. You can live life your way and, on your time, when you have our amazing appliances at your fingertips. Color: Fingerprint Resistant Stainless Steel.

306942650.Title: Summit Appliance 24 in. W 12.8 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in Stainless Steel, Counter Depth, Stainless steel/platinum
306942650.Description: The FFBF181ESIMLHD is a bottom freezer refrigerator with a unique 24 in. W x 25-1/4 in. D footprint and generous 12.8 cu. ft. capacity. It comes in a platinum cabinet finish with stainless steel doors and designer handles. The exterior digital control panel lets you manage the refrigerator and freezer temperature without opening the door. The control panel includes an audible and visual high temperature and open-door alarm to help protect stored contents. Inside, the FFBF181ESIMLHD features a fully frost-free freezer compartment and an automatic defrost refrigerator section. The refrigerator section includes adjustable spill-proof glass shelves, as well as a scalloped shelf ideal for storing wine and other bottled beverages. The door features adjustable racks to accommodate a variety of sizes. This unit includes a ZeroZone deli drawer ideal for storing meats and cheeses at slightly colder temperatures than the rest of the refrigerator compartment. The large crisper drawer features humidity control for optimum storage of fruits and vegetables. This unit is equipped with adaptive intelligent technology that utilizes innovative sensors to automatically adjust to your habits. The lower frost-free freezer compartment is equipped with two slide-out drawers with plastic fronts and a factory installed icemaker. NOTE: This unit ships with a non-reversible left-hand door swing. For a right-hand version, see the FFBF181ESIM. Color: Stainless steel/platinum.

305444219.Title: KitchenAid 27 cu. ft. Bottom Freezer Refrigerator in PrintShield Black Stainless with Exterior Ice and Water, Black Stainless with PrintShield Finish
305444219.Description: This 26.8 cu. ft. French door refrigerator helps fresh produce stay that way with the ExtendFresh Temperature Management System. A pull-out tray accommodates large platters with ease, while a FreshChill Temperature-Controlled Full-Width Pantry lets you optimize temperature and airflow for the specific food you're storing. The refined interior design features LED lighting, and metallic accents add a touch of elegance. Color: Black Stainless with PrintShield Finish.
